pablomartin4btc: curious what the issue is here: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/817#issuecomment-3432742271
and if is something I can help with
pablomartin4btc: I think we should work on getting rid of bringToFront() as there is no top or front on wayland, ultimately this function is useless
and I think this: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/817 could be solved by calling requestActivate() on the child window
store a pointer of the transaction detail window and call requestActivate() on that, something like this
hrm, I'm seeing reports that requestActivate() won't work on wayland either
err, requestActivate() should signal the compositor via xdg-activation that another window wants focus, then you'll get a visual bell, but it won't steal focus (which is good IMO)
